message: Let's start with a reasonable offer, Bob. I believe this split is fair considering the inflation working against me.
Alice, your offer was heavily skewed in your favor.  Let's be realistic. This is a much fairer split considering the inflation will hit you harder than me.
Bob, I understand the inflation disparity. This offer still gives you a good deal while acknowledging the time pressure we both face.
Alice, we're running out of time. This is my final offer. It accounts for the inflation, offering you a reasonable sum considering its diminishing value over time.
